title: Can't Log In.
body:
This actually happened a few days ago. Been trying to do all the recommendations people told me to try. Never worked. So, when I log in, It would usually say loading but instead, it said "Did not recieve a response from server (retrying attempt (1) ) After that there was a message that said all these links which would help but it didn't work . . I play league a lot but I don't really know where to ask for help.  If you know what happened please tell me immediately.  And please tell me where to write this stuff  since I only think forums is the one. Suffering without league.. man 

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}} {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}  Trying T ~ T

replies.body:
Hey there,

Could you please try [switching to a public DNS](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq5) for me, let me know if this helps.
